content.value:
TOP TIP:

I turned on a filter in settings that mutes all tweets from accounts which haven’t confirmed their e-mail & mobile number.

Amazingly it has instantly wiped all racism from my feed, coz surprisingly people who express those kind of views don’t like being identified.
content.html: TOP TIP: I turned on a filter in settings that mutes all tweets from accounts which haven’t confirmed their e-mail & mobile number. Amazingly it has instantly wiped all racism from my feed, coz surprisingly people who express those kind of views don’t like being identified.
